paragraphs.text: I am, as of yesterday, officially a production assistant at Dreamworks Animation.
paragraphs.name: b570

paragraphs.text: AHHHHH!!!!!!
paragraphs.name: d59e
a266
paragraphs.text: I was first asked if I’d be interested in interviewing when a writer for Dreamworks read my work on Medium. That blows my mind. Medium has legitimately absolutely changed my life!

ae6845c90965.bio: Still reeling from the fortune cookie that destroyed my faith. The slip of paper said, “The secret of life is …” but the final words were smudged into oblivion.
ae6845c90965.name: Sonny Bohanan

37d07410f039.bio: Millennial witch of Medium. Writer/comedy nerd/animation PA. Halfheartedly shrugging my way to the top. Views my own | www.ellieguzman.com
37d07410f039.name: Ellie Guzman

76152d23fa7.bio: I'm just this crazy older lady who has waited a life time to find her own self and voice. I have two daughter's and 5 grandchildren. thor092012@gmail.com
76152d23fa7.name: Caroline Hager. aka: MEMAW/SUNSHINE

d86e4eb7c052.bio: I’m a cat lover who happens to be able to write decently well and know a thing or two about psychology. I’m also an artist at heart, but I can barely draw
d86e4eb7c052.name: Xara Nahara O'Connor

1b8a8813ccde.bio: quant and visual artist. for commissions, grahama@me.com
1b8a8813ccde.name: Graham Anderson

1a63cf04da58.bio: Perpetually three eighth notes shy of a homicide.
1a63cf04da58.name: Classical Sass

7c20b526330d.bio: President, Founder, & CEO of Integrated Roadways, Argumentative Contrarian, Futurist, Technologist, Concerned Citizen, Cynical Optimist
7c20b526330d.name: Tim Sylvester

8cd3febe8199.bio: Mellow Drama Queen strikes thought matches. Hold cursor over name to see top 3 stories. Subscribe to my publication Augusta Khalil Ibrahim for xclusive stories
8cd3febe8199.name: augustkhalilibrahim

aa037d918682.bio: Seeker and Director of Spazhouse Intuitive Research. How can I help you? www.spazhousellc.com @spazhousellc
aa037d918682.name: Roxanne Henkle

8772c9636975.bio: Photographer / Woodworker / Long-Distance Walker / Civilized Nomad
8772c9636975.name: Ess Bradford Davis

b5dc0c4768f6.bio: I love Science, computers, table tennis, hand-games, burnout, and sharing funny stories with friends.
b5dc0c4768f6.name: Dheeraj Dhobley

59b29e866117.bio: Purveyor of anecdotal information; pattern recognizer; tool user; into that creative thingy.
59b29e866117.name: Mac McCarty

4928f82f9192.bio: “Do anything, but let it produce joy.” ― Whitman
4928f82f9192.name: Anna Breslin

764bb738c763.bio: Tribune of Medium. Mayor Emeritus of LiveJournal. Third Pharaoh of the Elusive Order of St. John the Dwarf. I am to Medium what bratwurst is to food.
764bb738c763.name: Gutbloom

db0cae7468d0.bio: Husband & developer, tech writer & IT manager. I fill what’s empty, empty what’s full, and scratch where it itches. Occasionally do weird & goofy things.
db0cae7468d0.name: Jack Herlocker

679fdd17b604.bio: On good days I am charming as fuck. Oh, and I write about things like love and sex and feelings.
679fdd17b604.name: Stella J. McKenna

2dc2523531fa.bio: Juggling Wordsmith and delightfully mumbling poet. The world is a stage and William Shakespeare is a Taurus - like me!
2dc2523531fa.name: Ezinne Ukoha

330f53a0898f.bio: Dad and Gampa to two beautiful girls!
330f53a0898f.name: Jim Reeves

614366d54cd0.bio: Writer & artist. Blogger for The Coffeelicious, Crossing Genres & HuffPost. sherrylynncaris@gmail.com. www.facebook.com/Sherry-Caris-Drawings-1661419610792654/
614366d54cd0.name: Sherry Caris

paragraphs.name: f997
paragraphs.text: Excellent news. Not for you, for me! I want everyone to know that I MADE Ellie Guzman on Medium. Why, when I first found her she was writing under a rock and had something like -5 followers.

paragraphs.name: cc13
paragraphs.text: I noticed her talent right away. I can spot talent, and while it’s true that my first comment on any of her posts was, “U millennials R…

paragraphs.name: e309
paragraphs.text: . Best wishes dear Ellie Guzman !

paragraphs.text: Congratulations. This is fantastic as you shared your work consistently on Medium. May you make the world funnier and endearing through the great writing at Dreamworks. Say Hi to Stephen Spielberg for me.

15b01891e754.title: Your writing here on Mediun has been magic — every single post.

paragraphs.text: A PA’s life is crammed with infinite varieties of crazy. No doubt — your voice will do it justice. Good hunting and Congratulations!
